text: Ani jo manusya tyaprasangi tyancyakaduna patha phiravila, parantu jara koni ladhanyaca pavitra badalata asela kinva jo apalya samuhakade asraya ghenyasathi yeta asela (tara gosta vegali) matra jo dusara ase karila tara to allahaca prakopa odhavuna ghe'ila ani tyace thikana jahannama asela, ani te atisaya va'ita thikana ahe
